body_html: It would certainly avoid an API review if you did this. In addition, it might also make sense for this to be in contrib/opt like some other optimizers, so that we can evolve the delay compensated optimizers further. All code in core has API stability guarantees that will far outlast the initial maintainers :)

body: It would certainly avoid an API review if you did this.  In addition, it might also make sense for this to be in contrib/opt like some other optimizers, so that we can evolve the delay compensated optimizers further.  All code in core has API stability guarantees that will far outlast the initial maintainers :)
